root.name: Foto Showdown
root.description: Gameplay Using the DSi’s camera, players snatch picture of everyday objects or living things and the game spawns a monster based on the picture. The color and shape of the monster is determined by the dominant colors of the real object or thing as certain colors translate to certain elements or attributes in the game. When the game has processed the players’ pictures, the player will then play through numerous levels and tournaments and is able to level up any monsters they have. If a player connects their game wirelessly they can fight other players or simply trade monsters for more monsters.
